title.rendered: Benefits of a Custom-Tiled Shower Installed In Your Vaughan Bathroom?

content.rendered:
Update your bathroom the right way with a custom-tiled shower. Discover how this shower style differs from prefabricated units and some of the benefits of choosing a custom installation. With Handyman Connection, a single call can help you transform your bathroom with custom shower and flooring services in Vaughan.

Custom-Tiled Showers

A custom-tiled shower differs from other styles in a number of ways, but the most important difference is that it’s made of individual tiles assembled on-site by a skilled contractor. Other shower installations come as a single piece or several pieces assembled at a factory.

A custom tile project starts with a layer of cement board panels to support the tiles, mortar and grout. These boards must be secured properly to avoid the shower walls and floor flexing, cracking and leaking.

Next, a professional tiler applies mortar and carefully positions the tiles in the desired style. Tiles must be firmly pressed into the mortar, but not so firmly that they displace all the mortar underneath the tiles. Mixing and applying thick mortar is an exhausting process and requires a set of specialized tools to perform effectively.

Grout is used to finish off the spacing between the tiles once the mortar fully dries. Some grout mixtures are fully waterproof, while others require a sealant to be applied over the surface.

Pros and Cons of Tiled Showers

A custom-tiled shower is a high-quality addition to any bathroom. The durable materials and unique design may be more of an investment than a prefabricated shower stall, but they typically add more value to your home.

Choose a custom tile project to make the shower you want. You’re in charge of the dimensions, colour, texture and design of the shower walls and floor. Create a stunning mosaic or a large, welcoming walk-in shower with these durable materials.

It’s essential to choose a professional contractor for this project. Improper tile installation can cause tiles to fall, which can injure you or someone in your household. An improperly installed tile surface may not be waterproof, so you could cause a significant amount of water to leak into your wall cavities and under your floor.

Most grout products come in virtually unlimited colour options, but they also require some maintenance. You’ll need to have the tile periodically sealed to prevent leaks after years of use.

Cost of Shower and Floor Tile Installation Services

The cost of floor tile installation services and custom-tiled shower prices range considerably. You can expect to pay more for a tiled shower than a fibreglass one, but the specific cost depends on a number of factors. Here are some factors that affect the cost of your tile project:

  • Type of tile
  • Dimensions of project
  • Design chosen
  • Existing floor and wall materials

You can expect to pay more for a custom pattern or mosaic, but even a generic design will cost more than a fibreglass shower stall. Thankfully, this investment typically adds value to your home and tile can last longer than other shower wall materials.

How Custom-Tiled Showers Can Feel More Spacious

You can create the size of shower you want with tile. Instead of choosing between a few bathtub or shower stall dimensions, a tiling project gives you the freedom to create an open, airy shower. Glass walls make a space-saving tile shower stall feel even larger, helping you save on tile costs without creating a cramped style.

Why Choose Handyman Connection for Your Shower Project

Don’t settle for a subpar shower stall. Request an estimate from Handyman Connection to see how you can receive a stunning, custom-made shower. Compare quality tile shower and flooring services in Vaughan today to find a personalized solution for your bathroom update.
